website_summaries.verdict: Featuring a balanced mixture of vitamin-fortified pellets, whole mealworms, and savory shrimp, this hermit crab food is literally a buffet of delicious tastes and healthy ingredients.
pros: Dried river shrimp, dried mealworms, fish meal, ground corn, herring meal, and dried whole egg are the first 6 ingredients
Rich with multiple protein sources and flavors
cons: We’d like to see this meaty hermit crab food available in larger options than its default 2.4 oz

customer_reviews.title: Two claws up, WAAAAY up.
customer_reviews.text: It's funny, leaving a review for Hermit crab food. I mean, really...what do I say here? The crabs LOVE this food...you can see their little faces light up as they're chowing down. I'm pretty sure I keep hearing them say "MMMM delicious". I was curious so I had a spoonful myself...it's a bit fishy and could use salt. (no, I didn't really try it). Maybe the best thing I can say is that my crabs seem to be eating it...I mean they're not dead.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Hermit crabs had no interest
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs have not touched this. They have zero interest. I joined a few Facebook groups and found a safe foods list. Now they’re getting raw honey, a mix of fresh fruits and veggies, crushed egg shell, and boiled chicken. I also just placed an order at hermieskitchen.com I have read about pellet food containing chemicals that can be harmful to your crabs. They must know what’s good for them and what’s not because they won’t even come near this.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy Coburn

customer_reviews.title: Dead bugs yummy
customer_reviews.text: All I can say about this is the crabbies eat it. I use it to keep near their tank for days when I'm busy and don't have time to go get them something from the kitchen. I can grab this as I pass by and give them something for the day. Its looks like dried grubs and kibble. If you have some crabs, be sure to rotate what they are eating. Don't just try to find the best crab food in a bottle and give them the same thing each day.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N Mikulaninec

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but my crabs don’t like it
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, appears fresh. This appears to be a great blend of crunchies, but unfortunately my crabs pick out one or two things (the pellets) and I end up pitching a majority of the blend. Maybe they are just picky? Still giving it 4 stars because if I were a crab I’d be chowing on it.
customer_reviews.author: nonsensely

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Crabs gives it 5 Stars!!
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crab seems to like this. It lasts a very long time! I still have majority of the bottle and I’ve had it for months.
customer_reviews.author: PhanVan

customer_reviews.title: Crabs love the shrimp!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It has shrimp and meal worms in it which are awesome sources of protein. This is also the only food I've been able to find without copper sulfate or ethoxyquin. My crabs seem to really like it. My only complaint is that when I opened the container, there was one live beetle in it. Other than that, awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives my crab the energy she needs
customer_reviews.text: My crab loves this stuff. Mix it will some apple slices and she is all about her 2am intense workouts. She gets all amped up and hangs from the ceiling it’s great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: jennipher

customer_reviews.title: Bugs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 hermit crabs but every time I use it I find tiny bugs in it and in the cage! I threw it out!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Durschlag

customer_reviews.title: Mealworm stingy
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty good while the mealworms lasted - but there wasn't that many included. My crab loved the mealworms but doesn't touch the pellets
customer_reviews.author: R. Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Great product /bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good hermit food ,lots of hermits favorite in it ..the box it arrived in was smashed and half opened ..but the food was sealed.
customer_reviews.author: sherry hovatter

customer_reviews.title: They do not seem to go crazy over this like other standard hermit crab food
customer_reviews.text: My three hermit crabs (small and medium size) kinda graze on it when I don't put anything in their tank for awhile such as fresh fruit, veggies, etc. They do not seem to go crazy over this like other standard hermit crab food. They do however, go nuts over a homemade blend from a website I order from often. Flukers Buffet Blend does the job but they seem as excited about it like my dog's do over their bagged food.
customer_reviews.author: A.Mmm

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy again
customer_reviews.text: A black bug ran out of container as I was filling my hermit crabs food dish!
customer_reviews.author: tashua kreiser

customer_reviews.title: Stinks but crabs love it.
customer_reviews.text: Smells pretty rough if you get right on it but not enough to stink up the tank. But more importantly the crabs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kolman

customer_reviews.title: Smells gross, crabs love it
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a good blend for our crabs. It smells very fishy which they seem to like, not me though lol. It's a good sixed container too, I'm not sure if they can eat it all by the time it expires honestly.
customer_reviews.author: jbeth

customer_reviews.title: Hermie Loves His New Food
customer_reviews.text: I gave this blend five stars since my grandson's hermit crab obviously loves it. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AOKAST

customer_reviews.title: Ok food?
customer_reviews.text: There’s no smell which is a plus but the crabs haven’t taken a liking to it. Had to switch brands.
customer_reviews.author: Cap

customer_reviews.title: Hermies love this!
customer_reviews.text: My crabbies live this stuff!! They literally come running when I out the food out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Not my crabs preference
customer_reviews.text: It smells funny. My crabs do not like this mix. It seems like bunch of insect shell bodies.
customer_reviews.author: Alightn

customer_reviews.title: Great for in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: This is great when you do not have time to give your crabs fresh foods.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L.

customer_reviews.title: May have picky hermits but they pick thru the food....
customer_reviews.text: The 3 HERMIT crabs we have tend to pick the little shrimp out and leave the pellets...
customer_reviews.author: Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Hermit crab food
customer_reviews.text: The hermit crabs seemed to love it so guess it's a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our crabs find it edible
customer_reviews.text: Its alright to feed them this blend now and then. They will eat it, but not 2 days in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Ed V

customer_reviews.title: Crab likes it
customer_reviews.text: Crab seems to like it. He is still alive so it must be good.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: well blended foods
customer_reviews.text: our Hermie loves the shrimps most of all in this product
customer_reviews.author: Brian D Jenner Jr

customer_reviews.title: Hermies seem to like it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's two hermit crabs. They seemed to like the worms & shrimp only at first but now started eating the nuggets too.
customer_reviews.author: Tulip

customer_reviews.title: My crab loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. My crab loves it & it lasts a long time. It's well priced. I will buy it again when I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hermit crabs loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs loved this blend. Was looking for somethings it’s more variety from their usual food.
customer_reviews.author: April George

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great deal. You also get a lot for the money. The quality is pretty good, and the variety is good. My only complaint is that one of my crabs does not enjoy the pellets or the mealworms, but LOVES the shrimp. I recommend it, but I would probably not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Green

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the hermits!
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs love it!! I will have to order more soon. The seem to be more lively, moving around more during the day as well. Will definitely continue buying this. Also it got delivered quicker than I expected, which was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Hermit Crabs seem to like it
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs seem to like it, I think because it's very fine and easier for them to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Katina N Caulder

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and the critters love it.
customer_reviews.text: The critters eat it and seem to prefer this over the other products we purchased from Walmart. They really like the dried shrimp (?) pieces. We will likely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JWeld

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this after reading the previous reviews. So glad we did! Our hermit crabs really like this food! It's fun watching them hang out in and around the food.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: The crabs do like the food
customer_reviews.text: The crabs do like the food. However, upon opening the product, there were live bugs in the container. This isn't the only product I've used that had this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs love this blend and have become more active since I started giving it to them.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee6

customer_reviews.title: Probably fine, but my crab wouldn't touch it
customer_reviews.text: My crab was NOT interested. Even with just the bugs. Not worth it if you don't know for sure that your crab likes bugs, because otherwise just the pellets are not good for them.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my hermit crabs to add variety to their diet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Food
customer_reviews.text: This bottle actually contains a lot of food and has a variety within the bottle as well. I feel the content and amount was worth my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Food
customer_reviews.text: This Buffet Blend is just right for my crabs. They really enjoy eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Welchert

customer_reviews.title: Super good for hermit crabs!
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs have grown so much on this food. Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine to our crabs
customer_reviews.text: It's basic hermit crab food. Seems fine to our crabs, what little they eat anyway. We have picky crabbies.
customer_reviews.author: Raifreviewer

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: My crabs love this food. i will buy this food again
customer_reviews.author: Debra Casey

customer_reviews.title: The hermit crabs are happy once again
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. The hermit crabs are happy once again!
customer_reviews.author: Avon Lady Heather Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well my crabs haven't complained and they are doing great
customer_reviews.author: hugogunther

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the seal, this stuff was full of mold. I threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

product_meta.title: Fluker's Buffet Blend for Hermit Crabs, 2.4-Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:2.4Serve your crabs an irresistible buffet packed with pellets, mealworms and river shrimp! Buffet Blend Diet for Hermit Crabs is a nutritious daily diet rich in protein and nutrients your hermit crab needs to thrive. Supports lively behavior, healthy growth and exoskeleton formation. 2.4 oz.
feature_bullets: Adds Instant Variety to your Crab's Diet!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
